name: Wizard Clicker
description:
Instructions:

To begin playing after the title screen simply tap (or click on pc) on the screen and hold to get the wizard to charge an attack. After a few attacks the enemy will die, a new one will immediately spawn, However you might notice some text in the left-hand corner labeled "Mana: x", this is how much mana you have and you get more mana by killing enemies.

Using Mana:

Once you've killed some enemies you might notice them getting stronger and harder to kill, this happens every 5 enemies. You can combat this by buying upgrades using mana. This can be done by clicking the scroll or the book under the mana label. The scroll increases the damage the wizard does and the book increases the damage done by the book that floats near the wizard.

Passive Mana:

When you are away the game will continue to kill enemies and collect mana for you so long as you have bought at least one level in the books damage.

Reset Data:

If you would like to hard reset your progress and game data you can do so by clicking the reset button in the left hand corner.
